node.name: Clover Fields
node.description: Gentle hills roll up and down as the field stretches to the horizon. Planted to clover and a sturdy, stubby grass, the land under its carpet of snow has an uneven texture. An occasional tree lifts barren branches skyward in anticipation of spring.

Gentle hills roll up and down as the darkened field blends into the night horizon. Planted to clover and a sturdy, stubby grass, the land under its carpet of snow has an uneven texture. An occasional tree lifts barren branches skyward in anticipation of spring.

Gentle hills roll up and down as the darkened field blends into the night horizon. Planted with a sturdy, stubby grass and clover, the clover's tiny white flowers dot the landscape, giving it an uneven texture. An occasional tree provides respite from summer storms.

node.name: Clover Fields
node.description: Gentle hills roll up and down as the field stretches to the horizon. Planted to clover and a sturdy, stubby grass, the land under its carpet of snow has an uneven texture. An occasional tree lifts barren branches skyward in anticipation of spring.

Gentle hills roll up and down as the darkened field blends into the night horizon. Planted to clover and a sturdy, stubby grass, the land under its carpet of snow has an uneven texture. An occasional tree lifts barren branches skyward in anticipation of spring.

Gentle hills roll up and down as the darkened field blends into the night horizon. Planted with a sturdy, stubby grass and clover, the clover's tiny white flowers dot the landscape, giving it an uneven texture. An occasional tree provides respite from summer storms.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: The ceiling in this cramped space indicates it was once a sizeable square but it is filled with rubble that looks like the remnants of an earthslide. A narrow passage, wide enough for one person, leads down into the earth.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A faint flickering in the distance gives just enough light to avoid banging into the support beams.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A thin rivulet trickles away from a small depression at the base of the west wall.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Fastened to an upright is a faded scrap of paper containing some smeared writing.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The sound of a twig cracking overhead serves as a reminder that the surface is very close in some parts of these tunnels.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Protruding from either side of an overhead beam is a bent nail upon which a stubby candle has been impaled.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The dusty floor is loaded with tracks that lead in all directions.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A splintered ceiling beam has been repaired by nailing another board over the damaged ends, which has lowered the available clearance height.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Gouged into the dirt itself is the word Dawnastruri.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A thin rivulet trickles away from a small depression at the base of the west wall.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A slight dampness in the tunnel air and some mold climbing the uprights hints at this area's proximity to the lake.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The sound of a twig cracking overhead serves as a reminder that the surface is very close in some parts of these tunnels.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The tunnel air is freshened by the scent of the lake entering from a hole concealed by the slats of a latticework behind a building.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Space is tight here, under the old oak tree. Tangled roots and moldy leaves mix with the dirt floor of this narrow, sloping pathway that leads deep into the earth. In one corner is an empty nest, most likely belonging to a mouse.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: At first this hole appears to simply drop straight down a few feet, enough to allow one to stand. As one becomes accustomed to the scant light it is obvious that it widens into a cavern that heads southwest. The rough floor is dry and dusty and covered with dead leaves that will crunch when stepped upon, which would signal anyone in the tunnel of your arrival.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Fastened to the wood post with a large nail is a rope sling that holds a burnt-out torch.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: This angled hole slopes sharply as it descends beneath the forest floor. The air smells damp probably from the small puddles remaining from the last rainfall. What appears to be a grey tail feather lies near some otherwise indistinguishable remains.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A slat meant to hold back the earthen wall has lost some nails and juts into the passageway.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The tunnel air is noticeably freshened by the scent of the lake that enters through a small hole between the shoring and the ceiling.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Dank and dusty, this cramped cavity runs the opposite direction from the hole dug in the ground above. While it may be the lack of sunlight, the walls here look to be a dark brown, seem crumbly in texture and emit the scent of hay and manure.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. The dusty floor is loaded with tracks that lead in all directions.

Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A good-sized tree root runs across the floor of the tunnel, the builders probably having decided to step over it rather than hack it out and have to fill in the resultant hole.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Stretched to the breaking point, the quiet of the tunnel seems to press downward so heavily it is almost tangible.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Fastened to the wood post with a large nail is a rope sling that holds a burnt-out torch.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Dark spots in the earthen walls trace the path of a few tree roots that have spread far from their trunks. Bits of grass mingle with the dirt in the shored up walls and the bottom of one of the posts protrudes far enough from the ceiling that care must be taken to avoid banging into it.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Protruding from either side of an overhead beam is a bent nail upon which a stubby candle has been impaled.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A slight dampness in the tunnel air and some mold climbing the uprights hints at this area's proximity to the lake.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A faint flickering in the distance gives just enough light to avoid banging into the support beams.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. A good-sized tree root runs across the floor of the tunnel, the builders probably having decided to step over it rather than hack it out and have to fill in the resultant hole.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Muffled voices from above serve as a reminder that silence is golden and any noise made here might well carry overhead. A damp, cool breeze seems to flow from the southwest, just enough to wonder if the tunnel might be flooded considering its proximity to the lake.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Overhead, slats form a latticework that supports the earthen ceiling and constrains dust caused by vibrations from the shed's floorboards. An odor like fermenting fruit tickles the nose and mingles with the damp-dry scent of the dirt.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Someone appears to have been attempting to mark their tracks on the earthen wall.

node.name: Duvli Rinu
node.description: Pine logs, once part of the forest that grew down to the lake's shore, brace the walls and ceiling in a pattern of large X's behind which the earthen walls can be seen. Dirt floors and walls release no dust when touched, and though firmly packed, absorb most of the sounds of movement. Fastened to the wood post with a large nail is a rope sling that holds a burnt-out torch.

node.name: Siksraja, Fawaudzi Akren
node.description: The stark nature of this mountain area is revealed in the huge chunks of rock, which protrude haphazardly from the soil like toy blocks thrown in a tantrum. Some of the vegetation that is green provides a little relief from the beige and grey of the stone. Beneath an assortment of boulders deposited by a mountain slide, the path disappears.

node.name: Siksraja, Upon the Fawaudzi Akren
node.description: Affording a clear view of the mountain range and the lake far below, this boulder juts from the mountainside like a level front porch. Several possible pathways to continue the climb present themselves but none appear promising from a safety standpoint. The vegetation on the mountainside is sparse near a narrow crevice.

node.name: Dzilvawta Ala, Redivawzis Niche
node.description: Sandstone and earth form a narrow, long cocoon with just enough height to stand upright. The roughly chiseled ceiling and uneven walls appear deliberately patterned. Directly in front of a small niche, recessed into the back wall, are remnants of a fire that scorched the earthen floor.
The roughly chiseled ceiling and uneven walls appear patterned. Against the back wall, just beneath a small niche, the earthen floor is littered with the remnants of a fire.

node.name: Dzirta Nars, Ieeja Istava
node.description: This large room has been divided by curtains which can be pulled back to allow for large meetings. The area by the door is guarded by Gazlok, whose sole task is to ensure that only Rakash may enter. His austere cot and trunk leave plenty of space for passage though his chair is often used by those interested in discussing Rakash history or filled with a crony helping him pass time.

node.name: Dzirta Nars, Fasuteka
node.description: Wide floor planks of polished oak run the length of this room and beyond while the walls are rounded fresh-wood blonde logs chinked with mud and straw. A large painting hangs above a small bookshelf on the far wall.

node.name: Dzirta Nars, Parasts Istava
node.description: A few tables and chairs provide seating for those wishing to socialize, share a drink, or play a game. Wooden stools, complete with backs and arms to contain those who might overindulge, surround a wide counter. When Gazlok remembers to wind it, a grandfather orlog tracks the passage of time for those inclined to forget to go home.

node.name: Cefrit of Odcoru, Showroom
node.description: Rolled and tied skins that provide insulation are secured to the ceiling, allowing light to sift through the tiny cracks in the joints of the wide sideboards of the wagon. A curtain across the back wall divides the small showroom from the private areas, while a dark green rug muffles the occasional creak from the floorboards. Hooks, tables and shelves all display a variety of wares in the cramped area.

Rolled and tied skins that provide insulation when secured to the floor line the shop ceiling, allowing light to sift through the tiny cracks in the joints of the wide sideboards of the wagon. A curtain across the back wall divides the small showroom from the private areas while a dark green rug muffles the creaks underfoot that have developed since the last round of reinforcement.

node.name: Uz Zinat
node.description: This cramped tent bears obvious signs of repair with lighter patches interrupting the heavy soot stains that cover its interior. A braided carpet provides flooring while, on the table, a sputtering, half-burnt candle in a dull brass candlestick emits both light and a sulfurous scent.

node.name: Permutations of Siksraja
node.description: This small shop is brightened by gaethzen stars set into the top of its central support pole. A plush rug covers the floor and swathes of colorful fabrics are tacked to the tent walls, their hues matching those of a stack of pillows arranged near the back. Giving the tent a cluttered feel, wares are displayed upon every available surface, though many of the browsing Rakash customers seem to navigate the space without issue.

node.name: Kifa Awrocis, Showroom
node.description: Thick poles in an ingenious formation line the ceiling and provide plenty of angles from which to suspend the merchandise on display. Carved into one of the wider supports is a small sign.
Thick poles in an ingenious formation support the tent roof and provide plenty of angles from which to suspend the merchandise on display. Carved into one of the wider supports is a small sign.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Myriad shoots spring from worn stumps, forming branching bushes of deep green leaves. The bushes are scattered in loose rows here, as if basking in the sunshine. A small path wanders through a thick clump of the bushes, leading away from the plantation.

Myriad shoots spring from worn stumps, forming branching bushes of dark green leaves. The bushes are scattered in loose rows here, as if basking in the moonlight. A small path wanders through a shadowy clump of bushes, leading away from the plantation.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Uneven rows of stumps, the remains of bushes chopped down in their prime, crisscross the ground. Small shoots grow around the stumps, bravely returning life to the landscape. Woodchips surround the stumps, testimony to the recent demise of the mulberries.

Uneven rows of stumps, the remains of bushes chopped down in their prime, crisscross the ground. Small shoots grow around the stumps, bravely returning life to the shadowy landscape. Somewhere in the distance, hoots from a hunting owl drift on the night breeze.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Deer tracks weave amongst the stump rows, congregating in clumps where the new shoots have been mown down ruthlessly. The beaten bare dirt patches outnumber the sparse grass clumps growing between the stumps. An occasional insect sound breaks the silence.

Stump rows rise out of the shadows, standing amongst bare patches of dirt. Deer tracks twist between the stumps, dim and indistinct in the dark. Little sound breaks the silence, only the occasional sound of a bat or insect in the distance.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Green leafy limbs almost obscure a dark hole underneath one of the bushes, concealing its inhabitants from scrutiny. Uneven lines of paper mulberry bushes cover the ground, growing almost as tall as a Gor'Tog. Even the slightest breeze sets the foliage rustling, filling the area with soft sounds.

Uneven lines of paper mulberry bushes cover the ground, casting dark shadows. Dusky green leafy limbs conceal a deep hole underneath one of the bushes, hiding the inhabitants from discovery. Inky pools of darkness lurk beneath the spreading foliage, camouflaging the slender trunks.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Tall mulberry trees stretch their branches high overhead, meeting in a delicate tracery of leaves and twigs. The heavy growth of leaves prevents anything else sprouting. A network of exposed roots runs across the ground, ready to trip the unwary.

Tall mulberry trees stretch their branches high overhead, meeting in a delicate tracery of leaves and twigs. The leaves block the night sky, throwing the ground into deep shadows. A network of exposed roots runs across the earth, ready to trip the unwary.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Rising like a sentinel out of the rows of mulberry bushes, the bare trunk of a dead tree towers over the surrounding landscape. Tall enough to hide a dwarf, the bushes stretch in meandering ranks, leaves barely touching the neighboring bushes.

Rising like a sentinel out of the rows of mulberry bushes, the bare trunk of a dead tree towers over the nighttime landscape. Tall enough to hide a dwarf, the bushes stretch in meandering ranks, leaves barely touching their neighbors.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Fuzzy green leaves cover the fresh shoots that spring around chopped-off trunks. Grass covers most of the ground between the rows of emerging bushes. The rows stretch off into the distance in most directions, leaves swaying in the least bit of wind.
Dark green leaves cover the fresh shoots that spring around chopped-off trunks. Grass covers most of the ground between the rows of emerging bushes stretching off into the shadows in most directions.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Sometime in the past something knocked over one of the trees cultivated here, and the trunk and bare limbs remain. Other trees still thrive in irregular rows, limbs meeting high above. The luxuriant growth has choked out any ground cover, leaving the ground bare.

Something long ago knocked over one of the trees cultivated here, and only the bare trunk and limbs remain. Other trees still thrive in irregular rows, limbs meeting high above. No ground cover grows beneath the trees, leaving the bare ground shrouded in shadows.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Leafy branches from a small grove of white mulberries twine overhead, blocking out the sky. The least puff of wind sets the linked branches creaking and swaying. A heavy litter of dead leaves carpets the ground, rustling underfoot

Leafy branches from a small grove of white mulberries twine overhead, blocking out the sky. The least puff of wind sets the linked branches creaking and swaying. A heavy litter of dead leaves carpets the ground, rustling underfoot.

node.name: Siksraja, Koks Laukrajas
node.description: Flitting birds dart from branch to branch amongst the mulberry bushes, alighting briefly before once more taking wing. A ratty skin lies abandoned under one of the bushes, rips and tears marring its surface. The profuse foliage prevents other vegetation from taking root, leaving just bare dirt underfoot.

Abandoned beneath a bush, a ratty skin lies covered with rips and tears. Deep shadows surround the mulberry bushes, obscuring the foliage and the bare earth alike. The sound of chirping crickets periodically fills the area, before once more falling silent.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Painted Hallways
node.description: Dug through the earth, an expansive hallway curves to the northeast, cutting through a vein of rock and sand. The excavated tunnel is supported with stone and timber pillars. Painted along the walls are flowing patterns, a mosaic of hand prints and crude sketches of figures kneeling before a very large multi-limbed being. The ground is hard packed but rippled, the sand pushed by strong and erratic air currents from the north.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Painted Hallways
node.description: Sinuously curving, a winding painting from the south smoothly blends into an array of carvings which continues to the north, depicting a very large multi-limbed being striding above stylized trees. The opposing wall is compacted sand, which engulfs several stone pillars and timber braces.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Painted Hallways
node.description: A strong breeze comes from the north, fine particulates flowing along the ground and collecting in loose piles against the walls. The stone wall is covered from floor to ceiling in indecipherable characters which are worn nearly smooth with the passage of sand. The imagery depicts a very large multi-limbed figure, surrounded by written words and icons. The figure appears to be grappling with what is either a mountain or a castle.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Painted Hallways
node.description: The hallway terminates in a perfectly flat and level wall of sand which continually sheds material, a strong breeze carrying stinging grains to the south. A muffled cacophony of grinding stone can be heard beyond the barrier and is still quite loud despite the auditory damping of the compacted sand. Along the stone side wall, a carved mosaic of worn words flows smoothly into the sandy obstruction, which abruptly obscures half of an image of a word-wrapped figure kneeling within a starburst.

node.name: Siksraja, Saralt Kaste
node.description: Cinnamon and fresh bread scent the air so heavily that some customers seem to have difficulty remembering what they came to purchase. Tilted racks line the surrounding walls, displaying the current items for sale. Only the freshest goods will do for Siksraja and the baker can be heard through swinging half-doors, giving orders in the kitchen to his staff.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Workshop Entrance
node.description: Designed for storage, numerous benches, tables, shelves, and cabinets fill the walls and floor. Packed with slabs of wet clay wrapped in oilskin, various sponges, loops, fettling knives and scrapers, much of the space is dedicated to storage of materials and tools used in the shaping of clay. In contrast to the dry air from the south, a warm, damp breeze wafts from the north.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Shaping Station
node.description: A wide workbench stands in the center of the area, a large rotating stone disc centered in the middle of the table. A fettling knife and wooden mold of a large torso stand off to one side, with several drying scraps of clay littering the table's surface. Hot air wafts from the northwest.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Kilns
node.description: Four large brick and mud-packed kilns stand against the northern wall, open and full of various fired clay body parts. An open firebox has been largely cleaned of ash.

node.name: Noldaet Ala, Glazing Station
node.description: A stained workbench sits against the eastern wall, several open pots and jars of various color paints and oils neatly pushed against the back of the table. Adjacent wire racks hold several pieces of painted and glazed clay -- sections of finger, hand, wrist, and arm, all delicately arrayed to prevent dripping. A single paintbrush sits on the workbench.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Submerged Pathway
node.description: Set at regular intervals, a road of wide, flat stones lies barely submerged beneath the lake surface. Stalactites reach from above, the ceiling fading into darkness. The light of the shoreline can be seen weakly to the north, a gloomy, mist filled darkness filling the south.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Submerged Pathway
node.description: Gentle waves, no more than ripples, play across the submerged stones. In the midst of near utter silence, the strange acoustics of the surrounding gloom devour all noise. Far above, glow worms cast pinpricks of slowly moving blue-green light, and to the south, a billowing wall of gloomy mist obscures the pathway, lit from within with faint flickers of swirled gaethzen light.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Island
node.description: A rocky platform emerges from the lake, smoothed by either careful handwork or aeons of steady erosion. The waters lap silently against the little island, gently swaying almost imperceptibly up and down the gradual slope of the shoreline. At the center of the island stands a dais, the epicenter of a perfect sphere of churning mists which enclose the space.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Island
node.description: The smooth shoreline sways slightly more rigorously here, pushed by an easterly current that swirls around the the island. A mounted gaethzen orb provides a dim illumination, casting a weak light over the island.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Dais
node.description: At the center of the dais rises a thick column of gypsum encrusted with smoothly polished fluorite and calcite crystals, atop which rests a small, carved, soapstone fox. Perfectly marking the epicenter of the sphere of churning mists which enclose the space, the figurine surveys the near silent area.

node.name: Noladet Ala, Island
node.description: A large crack spiders outward from the southwestern portion of the dais, shattered flecks of rock and crystal glistening in the weak light of a gaethzen orb. At its thickest, the crack sloshes with water, having split the small island open.
